page.title: 12Hillcrest Nurseries
page.content: This four acre holding is geared to producing vegetables and fruit and salad crops including{raspberries, {blackcurrants and gooseberries,}for {local trade}calling at the door. Plants and shrubs are also grown. There are three greenhouses and the gardens are well set out and beginning to mature. The business has been going for 2\ years. Because it is not in a very prominent position, but set on a quiet country lane,{advertising}should be a prime consideration, but the owners, at present, seem reluctant to take advantage of modern advertising and rely on local{'Word of Mouth'}custom.
